nodes.text: The Waters of the Primal Destroyer was the name given to the shallow lake in the Ancient Stasis Zone of the Tomb on the planet Belsavis. It earned the name after the terentatek known as the Primal Destroyer was released during the invasion of Belsavis and made its home in the shallow lake.
The Waters of the Primal Destroyer appears as a Heroic Area on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic; it is the site of the planet's World Boss, the Primal Destroyer.
